com.graphql_java_generator.client.GraphQLMutationExecutor

Packages that use GraphQLMutationExecutor
Package
Description
com.graphql_java_generator.samples.customtemplates.client.graphql.forum.client
 

  • Uses of GraphQLMutationExecutor in com.graphql_java_generator.samples.customtemplates.client.graphql.forum.client

    Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.samples.customtemplates.client.graphql.forum.client that implement GraphQLMutationExecutor
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Mutation
    This class contains the response for a full request.
    class 
    MutationExecutor
    This class contains the methods that allows the execution of the queries or mutations that are defined in the Mutation of the GraphQL schema.
    These methods allows: Preparation of full requests Execution of full prepared requests Execution of full direct requests Preparation of partial requests Execution of partial prepared requests Execution of partial direct requests You'll find all the documentation on the client page doc.
    class 
    MutationResponse
    Deprecated.
    Please use the Mutation class instead.
